author: battibass
body:
#### PR description

This PR is a back-port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48660. The inclusion of the changes described in the original PR will allow more muon DPG analyses to take advantage of centrally (and privately) produced ntuples.

#### PR validation:

Beyond performance studies reported in the original PR, the ntuples were validated issuing `runTheMatrix.py -l 2500.242,2500.243`
title: [15.0.X] Backport of Muon DPG custom-NANO updates enabling additional studies
